Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.model.data.products

Class BookOrManual

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.model.data.DatabaseObject
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.model.data.products.Product
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.model.data.products.BookOrManual
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BookOrManual extends Product
Represents a book or manual product with specific attributes such as ISBN, author, editor, release date, edition number, and volume number.

This class extends the general Product class and is categorized under the "BookOrManual" product category.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BookOrManual

      public BookOrManual(int price, int quantity, String title, String description, UUID sellerId, int fidelityPoints, String isbn, String author, String editor, BookOrManualGenre genre, LocalDate releaseDate, int editionNumber, int volumeNumber) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a BookOrManual with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      price - The price of the book or manual.
      quantity - The quantity available for sale.
      title - The title of the book or manual.
      description - The description of the book or manual.
      sellerId - The UUID of the seller offering the product.
      fidelityPoints - The fidelity points associated with the purchase of the product.
      isbn - The ISBN of the book or manual.
      author - The author of the book or manual.
      editor - The editor of the book or manual.
      genre - The genre of the book or manual.
      releaseDate - The release date of the book or manual.
      editionNumber - The edition number of the book or manual.
      volumeNumber - The volume number of the book or manual.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the edition number or volume number is negative.
